text: Currently on Gratipay we're using a non-released version of `oauthlib` in order to get #268. Per https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/issues/254#issuecomment-47131845 I'm creating a release issue so I can be notified when 0.6.4 has been released. S'okay? :-)
title: release 0.6.4

text:
I have tested this in py27, py34 and pypy (will do remaining tomorrow) for both oauthlib and flask-oauthlib, django-oauth-toolkit and requests-oauthlib. None of which the current master cause failing unittests.

@lepture, @masci, @evonove, @widnyana please let me know if current master cause you any issues. If not Ill go ahead and push a new release in the weekend or early next week.
@ib-lundgren I'm good, haven't found any problem yet. :)
